abstract: Egyptian investigators plan to send damaged flight recorders from EgyptAir Flight 804, which crashed over Mediterranean in May 2016, to French experts who will try to repair them and recover any data.
lead_paragraph: If they can be restored, the black boxes found among the Airbus’s wreckage last week could help determine if the plane crash was the result of terrorism.

headline.main: Black Boxes From EgyptAir Jet Are Going to France for Repair
headline.print_headline: France to Repair Flight Recorders of EgyptAir Jet

snippet: If they can be restored, the black boxes found among the Airbus’s wreckage last week could help determine if the plane crash was the result of terrorism.
